template.name: proc net tcp state
template.description:
In the output: cat /proc/net/tcp the 4th column means the connection state
Value mapping is as follows: 00=UNKNOWN 01=ESTABLISHED 02=SYN_SENT 03=SYN_RECV 04=FIN_WAIT1 05=FIN_WAIT2 06=TIME_WAIT 07=CLOSED 08=CLOSE_WAIT 09=LAST_ACK 0A=LISTEN 0B=CLOSING
This template collects data every 1m and feeds all 12 indications. Zabbix agent 5.0 is limited for the data pick up of 64 kb Zabbix agent 6.0 can pick up 16 MB in one go
